DOC.brief_summary: This study compare intraindividually functional vision provide two different posterior chamber intraocular lens : AMO Tecnis Z9000 Alcon SA60AT Acrysoft . To see aspherical intraocular lens provide good functional vision traditional spherical intraocular lens .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Functional Vision Provided AMO Tecnis Z9000 Alcon SA60AT Acrysof
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective study , 20 patient bilateral catarct present cataract surgery randomly assign recieve aspherical intraocular lens ( AMO Tecnis Z9000 ) one eye spherical intraocular lens ( Alcon SA60AT Acrysof ) . All surgery perform one experience surgeon ( Fung-Rong Hu , MD ) clear cornea small incision phacoemulsification in-the-bag posterior chamber intraocular implantation . The patient follow 3 month , postoperative contrast sensitivity , contrast acuity , corneal & total ocular high-ordered aberration measure compare intraidividually two different IOL group . Outcome Measurement : 1 . Contrast sensitivity testing : measure spectacle correction target distance three meter use wall-mounted FACT sine-wave grate chart nine level contrast.The graphic contrast sensitivity record log functional unit y-axis display five spatial frequency target ( 1.5 , 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 cycle per degree ( cpd ) ) x- axis . 2 . Contrast acuity testing : measure spectacle correction target distance three meter use logMAR letter chart ( Precision VisionÂ® ) represent wall-mounted illuminator cabinet.Two type contrast chart use , high contrast ( Cat.No.2103 SLOAN translucent chart ) low contrast ( Cat.No.2132 10 % SLOAN translucent chart ) , test photopic mesopic condition . 3 . Pupil diameter : measure Colvard infrared pupillometer ( Oasis . Medical , Glendora , CA , USA ) photopic mesopic luminance level . 4 . Corneal aberration analysis : perform TMS-4 ( Tomey , Japan ) .The corneal HOAs describe Zernike polynomial 3rd-to 5th- order root-mean-square ( RMS ) central 6mm diameter use VOLPro 6.89 software ( Fa . Sarver Associates , Carbondale . Ill , USA ) . 5 . Total ocular aberration analysis : perform Hartmann-Shack aberrometer ( Zywave , Bausch & Lomb Inc. , Rochester , New . York ) maximal mydriasis Mydrin-P ( phenylephrine hydrochloride 0.5 % tropicamide 0.5 % , Santen ) .The wavefront error describe use Zernike polynomial RMS total HOA pupil diameter 5 mm 6 mm , primary spherical ( Z 4,0 ) 3rd-to 5th-order aberration pupil diameter 6 mm . Data Analysis : - Mann-Whitney U matched-paired test use STATA software - P value 0.05 le consider statistically significant
DOC.criteria: Bilateral cataract , eligible phacoemulsification primary implantation posterior chamber IOL Willing able comply schedule visit study procedure Preoperative ocular pathology potentially affect visual acuity . EX : diabetic retinopathy , macular degeneration , corneal opacity , glaucoma , visual field defect ... etc . Previous ocular surgery . Ex : refractive surgery , vitreoretinal surgery ... etc . Patients cooperative study procedure
